tidbits.title: Tango Tradition
tidbits.description: Argentina is famous for the passionate dance form of tango, originating in the working-class neighborhoods of Buenos Aires, now celebrated worldwide.

tidbits.title: Gaucho Culture
tidbits.description: The gaucho, Argentina's iconic cowboy, represents a rich rural culture, known for horsemanship, folk music (folklore), and traditional attire.

tidbits.title: Breathtaking Landscapes
tidbits.description: Argentina offers diverse landscapes, from the Andes Mountains to the Pampas grasslands and the stunning Iguazu Falls, attracting nature lovers and adventurers.
